DataElement.preferredName: Patient Period Two Half Life Post Negation Modified Antibody Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to at least two half-lives elapsing since receiving unmodified antibodies.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Period Two Half Life Post Negation Change Antibody Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An interval of time._A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one._The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A type of protein made by B lymphocytes in response to a foreign substance (antigen). Each antibody only binds to a specific antigen, helping to destroy the antigen directly or by assisting white blood cells to destroy the antigen._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Period Two Half Life Post Negation Change Antibody Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: An interval of time._A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one._The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._A type of protein made by B lymphocytes in response to a foreign substance (antigen). Each antibody only binds to a specific antigen, helping to destroy the antigen directly or by assisting white blood cells to destroy the antigen._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

A type of protein made by B lymphocytes in response to a foreign substance (antigen). Each antibody only binds to a specific antigen, helping to destroy the antigen directly or by assisting white blood cells to destroy the antigen.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has at least two half-lives elapsed since receiving unmodified antibodies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have at least 2 half-lives elapsed since receiving an unmodified or T cell engaging antibodies prior to enrollment?
